name: i honger
description:
you honger. run around store in search of something that can satisfy you. well, i say something but i only gave you one option...

very short multiple choice game that technically has three endings and several different paths for how you can wander around the store; you can replay it several times to see all the different options in less than half an hour. 

this was my first experience trying to use renpy and was mostly just a way to experiment with it, and its also 3am, so please be gentle :')
